commands.title: Autocommiter: Refresh Models
commands.description: Fetch and cache available models from GitHub Models API

commands.title: Autocommiter: Select Model
commands.description: Choose your preferred AI model for commit message generation

commands.title: Autocommiter: Select Repositories
commands.description: Choose which repositories to track for autocommit

autocommiter.selectedModel.description: Default AI model to use for commit message generation (e.g., 'gpt-4o-mini', 'gpt-4o', 'Meta-Llama-3.1-70B-Instruct'). Use 'Autocommiter: Select Model' command to change.

autocommiter.enableGitmoji.description: Enable gitmoji prefixes for commit messages. When enabled, intelligently adds relevant emoji to the start of commit messages.

autocommiter.updateGitignore.description: Automatically update .gitignore to protect sensitive files (.env*, docx/) and nested repositories

autocommiter.gitignorePatterns.description: Patterns to add to .gitignore when updateGitignore is enabled

scripts.compile: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
